title: Blood pressure sensor

bloodpressure.description: ReadOnly, measured blood pressure in mmHG. It uses CSV (data type) containing systolic, diastolic values.

map.description: ReadOnly, measured blood pressure in mmHG. MAP(Mean Arterial Pressure) is a value of the integral of one cycle of the blood pressure curve divided by the period between successive heart beats.

observedtime.description: ReadOnly, An ISO8601 format time indicating when the data is observed (ex: 2016-02-15T09:19Z)
